1:0-1:19: STRUCT_DEF :: `struct S {
  x: u32,
}` :: S { x: uN[32] }
1:7-1:8: NAME_DEF :: `S` :: S { x: uN[32] }
1:14-1:17: TYPE_ANNOTATION :: `u32` :: uN[32]
2:0-2:31: FUNCTION :: `fn f() -> S {
  S { x: u32:42 }
}` :: () -> S { x: uN[32] }
2:3-2:4: NAME_DEF :: `f` :: () -> S { x: uN[32] }
2:10-2:11: TYPE_REF :: `S` :: S { x: uN[32] }
2:10-2:12: TYPE_ANNOTATION :: `S` :: S { x: uN[32] }
2:12-2:31: BLOCK :: `{
  S { x: u32:42 }
}` :: S { x: uN[32] }
2:16-2:29: STATEMENT :: `S { x: u32:42 }` :: S { x: uN[32] }
2:16-2:29: STRUCT_INSTANCE :: `S { x: u32:42 }` :: S { x: uN[32] }
2:21-2:24: TYPE_ANNOTATION :: `u32` :: uN[32]
2:25-2:27: NUMBER :: `u32:42` :: uN[32]
